> 

> PREPARE FOR AUTUMN WITH HTAFC 

07:05 17th September 2015 

Autumn & Winter ranges available now in htafcmegastore.com 

- Autumn & Winter ranges in store now 

- Get your new, official Huddersfield Town merchandise 

- Shop online or in store 

Huddersfield Town’s official retail outlets – the Stadium Superstore, Packhorse Centre store and htafcmegastore.com – have all the coats, hats, scarves and gloves you need to prepare for Autumn and Winter 2015! 

You can see a selection of the products below, but for a full range check out htafcmegastore.com!  

Coats – from £45 

Hats – from £4 

Scarves – from £5 

Gloves – from £6.50
